rukus.text: 18|60|Ara smarana karuna, yakhana musa tara sangi yubakake [1] balechilena, du’sagarera milanasthala na pauche ami thamaba na athaba ami yuga yuga dhare calate thakaba [2].
18|61|Atahpara tara ubhaye yakhana du’sagarera milanasthala pauchala tara nijedera machera katha bhule gela; phale seta surangera mato nijera patha kare sagare neme gela [1].
18|62|Atahpara yakhana tara aro agrasara hala musa tara sangike balalena, ‘amadera dupurera khabara ana, amara to e saphare klanta haye parechi.

18|63|Se balala, ‘apani ki laksya karechena ye, amara yakhana silakhande bisrama karachilama takhana machera ya ghatechila ami ta apanake janate bhule giyechilama sayatana'i setara katha amake bhuliye diyechila; ara machati ascaryajanakabhabe nijera patha kare sagare neme gela.
18|64|Musa balalena, amara to se sthanatira'i anusandhana karachilama [1]. Tarapara tara nijedera padacihna dhare phire calala.
18|65|Erapara tara saksata pela amadera bandadera madhye ekajanera, yake amara amadera kacha theke anugraha dana karechilama o amadera kacha theke siksa diyechilama eka bisesa jnana [1].
18|66|Musa take balalena, ‘ye jnana apanake dana kara hayeche ta theke amake siksa dibena, ya dbara ami sathika patha paba, e sarte ami apanara anusarana karaba ki [1]
18|67|se balala, apani kichute'i amara sange dhairya dharana kare thakate parabena na
18|68|ye bisaya apanara jnanayatta naya se bisaye apani dhairya dharana karabena kemana kare [1]?’
18|69|Musa balalena, ‘allah ca'ile apani amake dhairyasila pabena ebam apanara kono adesa ami aman'ya karaba na.
18|70|Se balala, ‘accha, apani yadi amara anusarana karabena'i tabe kono bisaye amake prasna karabena na, yataksana na ami se bisaye apanake kichu bali.
